means: 偷听（别人的谈话）( eavesdrop的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: We caught him eavesdropping outside the window.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们撞见他正在窗外偷听。

sentence.Network_en: Suddenly the kids, who had been eavesdropping, flew into the room.
sentence.Network_cn: 突然间, 一直在偷听的孩子们飞进屋来.

sentence.Network_en: She knew you were going to have a baby. She must have been eavesdropping on your conversation.
sentence.Network_cn: 她知道你们想有个孩子. 她准是总在偷听你们的谈话.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 计算机英语常用词汇 - 豆丁网 ... drive letter 驱动器名 eavesdropping 窃听、 窃取 edit menu 编辑选单.
eavesdropping 窃听、窃取 encrypted tunnel 加密通道 enterprise network 企业网.
Eeavesdropping 窃听,偷听窃听,偷听electric chair 电椅,电刑处死电椅,电刑处死.

list.abs: 英语日常口语 Unit70：Heartbreak for Alice... ... dreadful: 糟糕的 to eavesdrop: 偷听到.
被动窃听(passive eavesdropping):一个被动的攻击者简单地侦听经过的通信流。  主动攻击(active attack):在主动攻击中,敌人能够插入报文和删除或修改合法的报文。.
– 电子邮件最常被侵害的是电子窃听(electronic eavesdropping),或者是被称为网监听(sniffing)–  要认为你的密码非常的长而且有非常复杂的保护– 那和电子邮件的.
having hidden electronic eavesdropping devices ., 有隐藏的电子窃听装置的.

now this newspaper can reveal the deletions relate to the eavesdropping devices that were first installed Downing Street in July 1963 at the request of the then Prime Minister , Harold Macmillan .据《星期日邮报》了解到，这些非法装置时应时任首相的哈罗德·麦克米伦的要求而在1963年7月首次安装的。

entry.def: If you eavesdrop on someone, you listen secretly to what they are saying.

example.ex: The government illegally eavesdropped on his telephone conversations...
example.tran: 政府非法窃听了他的电话。

example.ex: The housemaid eavesdropped from behind the kitchen door.

auth_sentence.content: Companies are now taking measures to curtail the eavesdropping problem.
auth_sentence.res_content: Companies are now taking measures to curtail the eavesdropping problem.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Companies are now taking measures to curtail the eavesdropping problem.

auth_sentence.content: The eavesdropping techniques discussed in the article would not work against it.
auth_sentence.res_content: The eavesdropping techniques discussed in the article would not work against it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The eavesdropping techniques discussed in the article would not work against it.

auth_sentence.content: He'd spend hours eavesdropping on the radio chatter from local ambulances.
auth_sentence.res_content: He'd spend hours eavesdropping on the radio chatter from local ambulances.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He'd spend hours eavesdropping on the radio chatter from local ambulances.
